For everyone writing about the dreaded \"BLACK SCREEN\"...do some research online.  It\'s a common issue with crysis & warhead.  (I had the same problem-win. 7 32) hit CTRL+Alt+Delete, then select task manager, then click the Crysis icon on the bottom of the screen to bring it back up.nnIt will probably return in \"window mode\" so go to options/video options/ & click FULL SCREEN.nnWorks 99% of the time.
